meanings.definition: A place of residence or habitation.
meanings.sent1: My cozy abode is filled with laughter and love.
meanings.sent2: She returned to her abode after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse made its abode in the old shoe.
meanings.sent4: His abode was a fortress of solitude, away from the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned cabin stood as a lonely abode in the woods.

meanings.sent1: I abode in the peaceful countryside for the summer.
meanings.sent2: They abode in the small village for many years.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to abode in the warm sunbeam all day.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts abode on the memories of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The traveler abode in the quaint inn during his journey.
